description: A term no longer used. Formerly used for either a syntype or paratype.
Unique specimen, fixed by original designation or indication.
Unique specimen, fixed by designation of a syntype to be the lectotype.
Unique specimen, fixed by designation of a specimen to be the neotype.
One or more specimens remaining in syntype series after designation of the lectotype.
One or more specimens referred to in the original description in addition to the holotype.
Two or more specimens referred to in the original description of which neither is the holotype.
